nodes.text: Happer was a Mos Eisley police guard during the Galactic Civil War.
He was on duty when the Tonnika sisters were being detained at his facility's jail cells before being called away to an incident in Docking Bay 94 to back up the Imperial presence there.
Circa 1 ABY, he was tasked to investigate the murder of the lab assistant Bera Jeza.

Happer appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. In his rush to leave, Happer mistakenly told Riij Winward that there's trouble "brewing over at Docking Bay 97".
